reviews.title: Good replacement
reviews.review_text: I left my original charger at a hotel out of State. I bought this as the replacement. It works a little slower than the original but overall it's a good charger.
It doesn't charge my watch as fast enough, no matter which wall piece I use, but it's a pretty OK charger. It's a long charging cord, but that's about it. I think that's the only good feature.

reviews.title: Worked for 1 month
reviews.review_text: Worked well for about a month then completely stopped working, the other works intermittently. Waste of money.
The charger heated up so fast with in 15 minutes that I plugged it in. But well I did go for the off brand charger instead of the Apple one
The box came damaged, the wire itself looked like it had been bent, pulled and swung numerous times, the charger didn't even fit on my watch, it was an absolute disaster

reviews.title: Did not work
reviews.review_text: This charger did not work! I tried the USB plug, the type C plug, it did not work. I had bought this charger to take on vacation, so while on vacation I had to deal with returning the charger and getting another one.

reviews.title: Stopped charging!
reviews.review_text: It worked fine at first but after having it less than a month it stopped charging. I plugged it in using both the ports in multiple different blocks/outlets and even tried several watches on it. It will not charge any of our apple watches. The cord has not gotten damaged.

reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
reviews.review_text: At first, I loved it, but I encountered some issues after using it. It tends to get hot, and I have to monitor it while it charges, which makes me feel uneasy about leaving it plugged in. On the positive side, I appreciate the long cord and its durability.

reviews.title: Excellent and Versatile Charger
reviews.review_text: I bought a competitors charger in the past, a small USB plugin. It didn't fit where it needed to plug in and didn't hold my Apple Watch in place. I've been searching for a replacement and Xtreme Power Smartwatch Charger is just what I'm looking for. I can plug the cord in either USB-A or C, and place my smartwatch on a stable spot nearby and it'll be charged when I return.

reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
reviews.review_text: I honestly don't have a straight answer to recommend this product. I love how the cord is so long and has an attatanment to go from USB to c. The charger works great for the price you pay. Would I buy it again no, and that's because the cord ended up ripping apart from the main part where you charge the watch.just after one day of using it.I didn't even roll the cord up or stretch it out. Then the c part that attaches broke off right inside the charging port. Leaving me with. only the USB part to use. Overall what happened to me doesn't mean it will happen to you.

reviews.title: Love & Recommend
reviews.review_text: Very Affordable Especially For The Long Length That You Get ! I've Been Using This Brand Ever Since I've Had An Apple Watch ! I've Had Three Different Watch Generations & The Charger Works Perfectly Fine With Them All ! Watch Charge Veryy Fast It'll Take About An Hour & Almost An Half To Completely Charger To 100 From 0 !

reviews.title: Excellent durability
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Good • Extreme Portability: This is the charger's biggest selling point. Its small, lightweight, keychain design makes it incredibly easy to toss into a bag, attach to a backpack, or carry in a pocket without bulk. Perfect for travel, commuting, or long days out. • Convenience: The magnetic wireless charging module works as expected, easily snapping the watch into place. The ability to charge your watch anywhere—without needing a wall outlet or long cable—is genuinely useful for emergencies. • Decent Capacity: With typical capacities around 1200mAh (some listings suggest 2000mAh), it generally offers enough power for 2 to 4 full charges of an Apple Watch, depending on the model. This is plenty for a weekend trip. • Safety Features: Many versions include built-in protection against overcharging, overheating, and short-circuiting, providing some peace of mind.

reviews.title: Great charger
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Sooooo efficient. Very durable. It's in my travel ziplock bag for my concert days as nights. Very portable for that too. Compatible to my watch and all the watch users in my house. I didn't know you had to prove you got the package. I've had this for a year now. And still love it.

reviews.title: Perfect Charger – Fast, Compact, and Reliable!
reviews.review_text: This smart watch charger with the USB-C adapter is exactly what I needed! It charges my watch quickly and efficiently without overheating. The build quality feels solid, and the magnetic connection is strong and secure—no slipping or misalignment. I especially love the USB-C compatibility, which makes it super convenient to use with my laptop and modern wall chargers. Great for travel or everyday use. Highly recommended!

reviews.title: Xtreme
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received this product for free from Influenster and Xtreme in exchange for my honest review. Xtreme AC Smart Watch Charger with USB-C Adapter is a quick, easy go-to for any Apple Watch users. It's 6 feet long which helps to stretch way beyond the typical nightstand and electrical socket. It charges wirelessly and is magnetic which keeps it from being easily knocked off of the charge like other models. Also, I love how it has multiple ports which makes it easy to use in a socket, laptop, or any charger box. The cake also seems more durable than the typical cable since it's thicker. I would definitely recommend, and purchase again if needed.

reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This charger has a super long cord, which makes it convenient. I think my favorite feature is the addition of the USB to USB-C adapter that is attached to the cord itself this way it doesn't get lost, but you can use it both ways easily. The charger itself charges my Apple Watch quickly. I did notice that it got a little warm to the touch on both my Apple Watch and the charger after charging it to full battery. I find the cord to be a little long, and don't often use this charger far away enough to validate the length of the cord. But all in all a very good product that I use on the go.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This watch charger is so handy! I set it up at my desk at work so I can charge my watch while I'm sitting down and working. It works great! I love that there's an adapter so I can use it at home or the office.

reviews.title: Worth the purchase! Good quality!!
reviews.review_text: Overall great purchase! There is some truth to the reviews about the charger “not charging” or taking significantly long. I noticed that when trying to use the charger with my watch standing upright it would overheat and only charge to about 30%, then start declining in charge until it died. But once I began charging with my watch laying on it's side, I was experiencing 100% results. With my watch at 10% I'll say it takes 45 minutes-1 hour for a full charge but I leave it on all throughout the night. I wear my watch from 7am-7pm (working hours) and it doesn't die. By the time I put it on the charger the 10% notification finally pops through. I see no reason to not make the purchase. The adapter is also neat. I have a Series 1 apple watch so this should check off all your worries!

reviews.title: 6-foot cord is a game changer!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Most charging cords we've come across so far for apple watches are minimal in length. The 6 foot length of this one is fantastic! It charges just as well as any other charger we've used previously. Also love that the USB-C adapter is attached to the cord so it won't easily go missing, even if you're not readily using it. Having the adapter is fantastic, especially as we know that adapter plugs keep changing over the months and years.

reviews.title: Xtreme AC Watch Charger – Reliable & Convenient
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Xtreme AC Watch Charger works perfectly! It's highly compatible with my Apple Watch, making charging effortless. One of my favorite features is the dual charging ports, which allow me to use it with any charger base, adding extra convenience. The design is simple yet effective, ensuring a steady charge every time. It's a great option for those looking for a reliable and versatile charging solution. Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Best Watch Charging Cable EVER!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Xtreme AC Watch Charger is a game-changer for anyone who values both convenience and efficiency. This charger combines cutting-edge technology with a sleek, user-friendly design. I was genuinely impressed by how quickly and effortlessly it charged my smartwatch—within a matter of hours, it was at 100%, which is a huge plus for busy individuals like myself. The build quality is top-notch, with durable materials that feel premium without being bulky. It's lightweight and compact, so it's perfect for travel or on-the-go charging. One of my favorite features is its universal compatibility with most smartwatches, which means no more worrying about having multiple chargers for different devices. What really sets the Xtreme AC Watch Charger apart is its intelligent charging technology. It adjusts the power flow for optimal charging, ensuring no risk of overcharging or overheating. Plus, it's whisper-quiet, so it doesn't disrupt your surroundings while you're working or relaxing. It's also perfect for traveling and with 6 ft of cable, you won't be stuck trying to plug in a short cord into the wall! Overall, I couldn't be more satisfied with this charger. It's reliable, fast, and extremely convenient. If you're looking for a high-quality smartwatch charger that works flawlessly every time, the Xtreme AC Watch Charger is definitely worth every penny!

reviews.title: New travel charger!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] It works perfectly with my Apple Watch and airpods! It's convenient as it has a C port and USB, perfect for traveling! This holds my watch in place and is durable. I will definitely be taking this 2 in one charger now on my trips. Saves room for less cords!

reviews.title: Totally charged 👍
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I was excited to the XTREME AC watch charger. It was compatible with my iPhone. I did think that it would charge faster, but it took around 2 1/2 hours or a complete charge. I like that it has an adapter that I could plug into a computer or laptop. I think it works just as good as the Apple brand chargers.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've been needed a watch charger and I'm so excited for this one. I love how compatible, versatile and efficient it is with any plug. I take this with em everywhere it's pretty light and works just like other chargers.

reviews.title: Charges like my original.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I am very impressed with this Apple Watch charger. It charges just like my original charger . I really like how it comes with an adapter on the end so that you can plug it into different wall chargers. It seems very durable and is easy to take with you any where.

reviews.title: Amazing powerful little apple watch charger.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This apple watch charger is overall pretty amazing. It has a strong and durable magnet and cord and it charged my watch really fast. I would give it a solid 9 of 10 for a replacement charger, I have several different models of apple watch and it worked amazing on all of them. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.title: Charges my Apple Watch fast
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This extreme ac watch charger has worked good with my Apple Watch. I like the length of the charger and it very portable. Charging speed is great, doesn’t take long to fully charge. Hopefully it will last a long time.

reviews.title: Do not use!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Started charging my Apple Watch on this charger. Thank goodness I went and checked on it, the magnetic piece you lay your watch on was so hot like it could catch fire if left charging. I had to unplug it and it was not charging my watch barely at all. I will not be using this charger!

reviews.title: Works like a charm!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Xtreme AC watch charger is part of a broader category of powerful, versatile chargers, including devices like the myCharge Razor Xtreme. These chargers are praised for their large battery capacity and long-lasting performance, making them ideal for extended use. However, they tend to be on the heavier side, which may make portability slightly cumbersome. Additionally, while they provide a lot of power, users have noted that charging times can be slow. Nonetheless, many users recommend it for its reliability and high capacity

reviews.review_text: The ipone charging cord I purchased is great and it has both USB and C adaptors.

reviews.title: Apple watch charger
reviews.review_text: Bought it for girlfriend and so far its been over heating on first use
Charges it but gets extremely hot so I stopped using it. I feel like it was not good for the watch to get that hot every time it needed a charge.

reviews.title: Great charger
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Works great with my watch! It's super easy to use and convenient. It only works with the watch though, not my iphone. It charges super fast. Definitely a good charger.

reviews.title: Awesome Compatibility
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The compatibility with my husband's Samsung watch paired grrat! It's portable and doesn't take up any space. The charging speed is A1, and the durability is terrific.

reviews.title: Good quality
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Item is very durable and appealing quality. Worked well with my daughter device. Simple and easy to use. Charges quickly too! Recommended 100%

reviews.title: It's okay
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Very cheap! Works well, has a slow charge. It is portable and compatible with my device. Not sure about durability because it is cheap made, and I wouldn't recommend buying.
